ComicInfo.Summary:
Issues #1 and 2 the indicia reads as "Ms. Mystic Deathwatch 2000". Issue #3 indicia just says "Ms. Mystic". All 3 issues are part of the Deathwatch 2000 crossover.Polybagged, contains randomized trading cards. Has a Tyvek paper cover. Indicia only reads as "Ms. Mystic".
Continuity Publishing 62 West 45th St., New York, NY 10036 USA (212) 869-4170.
Entire package © 1993 Continuity Publishing Inc. Ms. Mystic©, Hybrids©, and Hellbenders© 1993 Neal Adams.
Deathwatch 2000 story arc #17.
